Ingredients.2: 0.5 pounds russet potatoes, peeled and cut into 1 1/2-inch thick slices

Ingredients.9: 2 (1 ounce) packages instant chicken gravy mix

Ingredients.11: 1 (16 ounce) package frozen peas and carrots, thawed

Directions.1: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Lightly grease a medium baking dish.

Directions.2: Cover potatoes with water in a saucepan and boil for 20 to 30 minutes, or until fork-tender. Drain and beat until smooth with an electric mixer. Add butter, milk, and salt and pepper to taste; beat to desired consistency.

Directions.3: Heat 1 tablespoon of oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Cook and stir turkey and onion until turkey is fully cooked. Add gravy mix and water; stir often, until gravy is thick and bubbly. Season with salt and pepper.

Directions.4: Add turkey mixture to the baking dish. Next, layer the peas and carrots, and top with the mashed potatoes. Top with a layer of shredded cheese.

Directions.5: Bake in the preheated oven for 20 to 25 minutes, or until cheese is melted and the potatoes are golden on the top.
